definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
The boundless vista is at the perilous peak (proverb)/fig. exhilaration follows a hard-won victory
pinyin: wu2 xian4 feng1 guang1 zai4 xian3 feng1

sentences.english: Last month I found myself climbing a steep mountain in a distant country.
sentences.chinese: 上个月我发现我自己在一个远方的国度攀登一座险峰。

sentences.english: This time, I finally a taste of the "infinite beauty in the Xianfeng" feeling.
sentences.chinese: 这下，我终于领略到了“无限风光在险峰”的感觉。

sentences.english: Having a rest They all feel comfortable after climbing the steep and dangerous peak.
sentences.chinese: 《歇息》感受着攀登险峰之后的舒适。

sentences.english: The perilous peak reveals scenery boundless and grand.
sentences.chinese: 天生一个仙人洞，无限风光在险峰。

sentences.english: Only about twenty meters in height, but in my eyes is too high to be reached to the peak.
sentences.chinese: 大约只有二十米高，但在我眼中却是高不可攀的险峰。

sentences.english: Yuhuangding, Mount Tai's highest peak, stands over deep valleys and above other perilous peaks.
sentences.chinese: 其巅峰玉皇顶为峡谷和险峰所环绕。

sentences.english: To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
sentences.chinese: 初登险峰时，最好放慢步。

sentences.english: On Dongshan steep peak and a drop may be overlooking the Musical Spring Hill.
sentences.chinese: 上东山险峰，可俯看郎君山与一滴泉。

sentences.english: Born of a Fairy Cave, infinite beauty in the dangerous mountain peak.
sentences.chinese: 天生一个仙人洞，无限风光在险峰。

sentences.english: The Huanghe bridge area in Huaping town, Jianshi county, central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 建始县花坪坪乡黄鹤桥风景区峰巅，无限风光在险峰。

definition: the peaks of a mountain range
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
